materials.raw_text: Barium (Ba) - 48 g; Lithium (Li) - 2 g; Neodymium (Nd) - 2 g; Praseodymium (Pr) - 4 g

sourcing.instructions: Barium can be sourced from chemical suppliers or online marketplaces; Lithium is available from battery suppliers or specialized chemical suppliers; Neodymium can be obtained from rare earth suppliers; Praseodymium is available from chemical suppliers who specialize in rare earth metals.

preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh out 48 g of Barium, 2 g of Lithium, 2 g of Neodymium, and 4 g of Praseodymium using a precise electronic balance. 2.
